name: Table And Chair
content: I have a table in my little bedroom
我的小卧室里面有个小桌子
My little table has a little chair
我的小桌子有个小椅子
I like to write on my little table
我喜欢坐在小椅子上
I like to sit on my little chair
在小桌子上写字
